nodes.text: The Star Wars Cookbook: Wookiee Pies, Clone Scones, and Other Galactic Goodies

The Star Wars Cookbook: Wookiee Pies, Clone Scones, and other Galactic Goodies is the third in a series of Star Wars Cookbooks, written by Robin Davis and Lara Starr, and was released on May 23, 2012.

May the Force be with all aspiring Jedi cooks as they use Yoda, Darth Vader, and R2-D2-shaped cookiee cutters to create 30 sweet and savory treats. From Chocolate Chewies to Obi-Wan Tons, this galactic cookbook features easy-to-make recipes for Star Wars-themed treats that will delight any Jedi appetite.
